description: React component for an AI-powered chat interface with conversation management, including fetching conversations/messages, sending messages, and UI rendering.

methods.name: scrollToBottom
methods.description: Scrolls chat view to the bottom smoothly.

methods.name: fetchConversations
methods.description: Fetches list of conversations from backend or mock data.

methods.name: fetchMessages
methods.description: Fetches messages for a specific conversation.

methods.name: handleSendMessage
methods.description: Handles sending a new message, updates UI, and manages API interaction.

methods.name: createNewChat
methods.description: Creates a new conversation and updates state.

methods.name: formatTimestamp
methods.description: Formats timestamp into a human-readable time string.
